Payments

You can use our Payments feature to send us fees ( admission fee, etc.. ), we will pay fees on behalf of you in college.

You can pay using Credit Cards, Debit Cards, Netbanking, Wallets, and UPI. Our payment gateway is totally safe and secure.

Please enter your full name, mobile number ( mobile number registered with eduHelp ), and description of payment for the Purpose of Payment section when you do the transaction.

Please click on the link Pay Fees With eduHelp ( given below ) to continue the transaction.


Pay Fees With eduHelp
